intro: Psychotria densa, commonly known as the dense psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in humid lowland forests. The plant is characterized by its dense, dark green foliage and small, clustered white flowers. It often grows as an understory plant, thriving in shaded, moist environments. Psychotria densa is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
